channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 8 Best Robot Vacuums of 2024, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re up against pet hair or you want to splurge on a high-end laser-guided robot vacuum, we have the perfect pick for you.

item.title: The 10 Best Gifts for Every Kind of Golfer (2024)
item.description: Make your favorite golfer’s day with the best gifts to enhance every part of their game.

item.title: Bluesky falling foul of EU rules by not reporting user numbers across the bloc
item.description: Bluesky, the social network that’s currently surging in popularity due to an exodus of users from rival X, is in breach of European Union (EU) regulat...

item.title: 7 Best Ski Gloves and Mittens, Editor Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: WIRED has tested the best ski gloves and mittens for every style and budget.

item.title: Authorities catch ‘SMS blaster’ gang that drove around Bangkok sending thousands of phishing messages
item.description: Thai authorities said the crime gang sent around a million malicious SMS text messages to nearby residents over a three-day period in November. © 2024...

item.title: 5 Best Personal Safety Alarms (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Make some noise for safety with our favorite alarms, from keychain sirens to wearable bracelets.

item.title: Instagram takes on Snapchat with new location-sharing feature
item.description: Instagram is introducing the ability for users to share their locations with their friends via DMs (direct messages), the company announced on Monday....

item.title: Novation Launchkey MK4 Review: A Great Cheap MIDI Keyboard
item.description: This affordable audio controller is great, especially if you use Ableton.
